metadata.title: CVE-2022-30948 Jenkins plugin: Mercurial SCM plugin can check out from the controller file system (important)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: The MITRE CVE dictionary describes this issue as: Jenkins Mercurial Plugin 2.16 and earlier allows attackers able to configure pipelines to check out some SCM repositories stored on the Jenkins controller's file system using local paths as SCM URLs, obtaining limited information about other projects' SCM contents.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
